title: Query Performance Comparison: RDBMS vs Graph Database
description: This interactive Chart.js visualization demonstrates the dramatic performance differences between relational databases using JOIN operations and graph databases using index-free adjacency for multi-hop relationship queries in healthcare data systems.
subject: Mathematics
topic: Query Performance Comparison: RDBMS vs Graph Database
author: Dan McCreary
learningObjectives: Understand the mathematical concept of query performance comparison: rdbms vs graph database
Apply query performance comparison: rdbms vs graph database to solve problems
Visualize and interpret query performance comparison: rdbms vs graph database relationships
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on query performance comparison: rdbms vs graph database
